message:
SA, 
Does anyone know how to download the youtube videos subtitles (closed caption)? 
I tried some command line tools like youtube-dl and youtube2srt but unfortunately it does not work with all of the videos.
For example the video in this link (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qmWCT_OgrKQ) contains closed caption but both youtube-dl and youtube2srt say the video does not have subtitle.
Can anyone at least explain why these tools can not download the subtitles from such videos? Is it a restriction set by the video owner or what?

data.message: you can use http://downsub.com/ i tried it with the link it works

Hi, I finally find a solution.
Here is a java application that do what I need. 
http://google2srt.sourceforge.net/en/ 
Thanks very much.
